string.value: I found something inside that strange book, and that was #p2111002#'s Secret Notes. Let's see what's inside... based on the information inside, I'll have to figure out #bthe person that #p2111002# trusts the most#k, and then go to that person to clarify it.
The person that #p2111002# trusts the most is actually #p2111002#'s friend #p2040050#. When I handed #p2040050# the #t4161031#, he looked concerned as he peered through the notes...
(When I opened the strange book again, I was able to find a small note hidden inside. This might be #b#t4161031##k... should I take it?)
(After carefully removing the note, I closed the book. Once closed, it looked just like any other book.)
(I left the note in the book and closed it.)

Did you... wind up finding any additional information on #p2111002#? Where he disappeared, why he disappeared... were you able to find any one of that? Ah... that book... that must be #t4161031#. Mind if I look through it?
(The book had turned back to... normal. It's just another ordinary book now. I am amazed by the power of alchemy...)

(Once I opened the book I found #t4161031# inside! This page had a drop of potion wetting the corner of the page that I dropped right before I lost the book! How did this happen? Anyway, I better remove the note from the book this time.)
